languages.text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
languages.original_text: Если в отряде нет других представителей того же архетипа, первое использование любой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} данного {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} этим персонажем в бою требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.

traits.locale_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

languages.text: Wenn kein anderer Charakter in der aktuellen Gruppe über denselben Archetyp verfügt wie dieser Charakter, kostet die erste Verwendung einer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} im Kampf durch diesen Charakter −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
languages.original_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: Wenn kein anderer Charakter in der aktuellen Gruppe aus einer imperialen Welt stammt, kostet der erste Einsatz einer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Charakters −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.

languages.text: Si aucun autre personnage du groupe actuel ne dispose d'un archétype identique à celui de ce personnage, la première {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} utilisée en combat par ce personnage coûte −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: Si aucun autre personnage du groupe actuel ne dispose d'un archétype identique à celui de ce personnage, la première {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} utilisée en combat par ce personnage coûte −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: 如果当前队伍中没有与此角色相同职业的角色，则在战斗中首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}职业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Career}能力{/g}时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
languages.original_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: 如果当前队伍中没有其他角色来自帝国世界，则帝国世界角色首次使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:Career}信条{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，该能力消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。

languages.text: Si ningún otro personaje tiene el mismo arquetipo que este personaje, la primera {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} de cada combate que use cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos.
languages.original_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: Si ningún otro personaje viene de un mundo Imperial, el primer uso de cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrina{/g} cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos.

languages.text: 現在の部隊に、このキャラクターと同じタイプを持つキャラクターが他にいない場合、各戦闘でこのキャラクターが使用する最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費量が-1減少する。
languages.original_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: 現在の部隊に、このキャラクターと同じタイプを持つキャラクターが他にいない場合、各戦闘でこのキャラクターが使用する最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費量が-1減少する。

languages.text: Если в отряде нет других представителей того же архетипа, первое использование любой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} данного {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} этим персонажем в бою требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
languages.original_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: Если в отряде нет других представителей имперских миров, то первое использование любой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}доктрины{/g} персонажа требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.

Если в отряде нет других представителей имперских миров, то первое использование любой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}доктрины{/g} персонажа требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.

languages.text: Mevcut grupta bu karakterle aynı arketipte başka bir karakter yoksa bu karakterin her çatışmada kullandığı ilk {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketip{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli 1 puan azalır.
languages.original_text: If no other character in the current party has the same archetype as this character, the first {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used in each combat by this character costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
